situation.title: Shopping
situation.meta_description: If you go shopping, follow the hygienic rules. While shopping, wear your mask and social distance (especially when waiting in a queue).

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Shop for more days in advance.

Choose a time to shop when there are fewer people in the store. Only be in the shop for the necessary time.

When entering and leaving the store, disinfect your hands with the antibacterial gel located by the entrance.

When going to a store please note that the number of customers in a store at one time is restricted. The maximum customer density allowed is 1 customer per 15 sq m vending area. In shops, where the vending area is smaller than 15 sq m this restriction, does not apply to a person accompanying a holder of an ID card for severely disabled (TP/ZTP, ZTP/P).

Shops must close at 11 PM.

Ask relatives or neighbours if they would help you buy groceries. It is also possible to use the services of volunteers.
